decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - Amendment to wording of Condition 2 as follows:

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: 179-KOD-00-01; 179-KOD-01-100; 179-KOD-01-101; 179-KOD-01-102; 179-KOD-01-103; 179-KOD-01-104; 179-KOD-01-105; 179-KOD-01-106; 179-KOD-01-107; 179-KOD-01-108; 179-KOD-01-109; 179-KOD-01-120; 179-KOD-01-121; 179-KOD-01-200; 179-KOD-01-201; 179-KOD-01-202; 179-KOD-01-203; 179-KOD-01-300; 179-KOD-01-301; 179-KOD-01-302; 179-KOD-01-303; 179-KOD-12-100; 179-KOD-12-101; 39048-5502-007 Rev B; 39048-5501-009 Rev A; 39048-5502-007 Rev B; 39048-5501-009 Rev A; CIL Phasing Plan

Condition : 2 - Supporting Documents:
Air Quality Assessment (Prepared by PBA, dated July 2018); Biodiversity Protection and enhancement strategy (Prepared by Middlemarch Environmental, Ref: RT-MME-123251); Daylight and Sunlight Report (Prepared by Point Surveyors, dated August 2018); Design and Access Statement (Prepared by East, dated August 2018); Energy Statement (Prepared by PBA, Dated July 2018); Flood Risk Assessment (Prepared by PBA, dated 13 July 2018); Ground Condition Assessment (Prepared by Card Geotechnics Limited dated December 2016 with supporting letter by PBA, dated 13 July 2018); Lighting Strategy (prepared by PBA, dated August 2018); Noise and Vibration Impact Assessment (Prepared by PBA, dated June 2018); Planning Statement (Prepared by Carter Jonas, dated August 2018); Residential Travel Plan Rev 3.0 (Prepared by PBA, dated February 2019); Scheme Internal Daylight Report (Prepared by Point Surveyors, dated August 2018); Surface Water Drainage Strategy (Prepared by PBA, Dated July 2018); Sustainability Statement (Prepared by PBA, dated July 2018); Transport Assessment (Prepared by PBA, Dated August 2018); Wind Microclimate Desk Study (Prepared by BMT, 1st August 2018); Statement of Community Involvement (Dated July 2018); Affordable Housing Viability Assessment (Prepared by JLL, Dated September 2018), associated Addendum (prepared by JLL, Dated August 2020) and agreed development appraisal (prepared by JLL and dated 12 October 2021; Transport Addendum prepared by PBA (Dated 12 December 2018); Supplementary Play Strategy (prepared by east); Response to GLA Stage 1 Report (Prepared by PBA, Dated 19/12/2018); Surface Water Drainage Planning Response (Prepared by PBA, Ref TNO01-Rev 1) 

Reason: For the purposes of proper planning
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission P/3671/18 dated 08/04/2022 to allow amendment of condition 2 to include CIL phasing plan to the list of approved plans
